title: Vietnam Server
body: So I would like to play League of Legends in Vietnam and I do not mind making a new account since I live in North America. What server should I play in Vietnam?  Thank you for your time. And please give me more details in your answer about the server you are talking about.

replies.body:
**Garena** operates and supports League of Legends for the Vietnam region. You can find information on this region [**here**](https://lienminh.garena.vn/) and can reach out to Garena support if you have any specific questions regarding their servers.

Let me know if this was helpful. ^.^
